chapter.title: IDE Support
chapter.para: Exadel Studio 4.0.4 is an IDE that provides full support for Java Server Faces, Exadel RichFaces, Ajax4jsf, Facelets, Struts, and other Web technologies. In addition to this, it seamlessly combines visual and source-oriented development approaches. One of the special support features for Ajax4jsf and RichFaces is that they are both available as project "capabilities". These project capabilities can be added to any existing JSF project to make the project an Ajax4jsf or RichFaces JSF project by automatically adding libraries and modifying configuration files as required.
